channel.title: GamesWorkshop on Peter's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in GamesWorkshop on Peter's Notebook

item.title: HobbyNotebook / Shame Golf (+143)
item.description: Miniature Shame Golf is a game of painting your miniatures.

item.title: Imperium Magazine
item.description:
Peter Bolger’s Content Listing
Paints I have … a thing … for paints. There are 25x12ml pots, 2x18ml pots and 4x24ml pots in the picture from the poster. Most came off of (or out of) this thread on FaceBook. So far 9x12ml and 1x24ml pots have been confirmed in upcoming issues. Another 7x12ml and 2x18ml are obvious from the pictures - assuming no “new” paints are created during the magazine’s run.

item.title: Mortal Realms
item.description: The Mortal Realms is a partwork magazine run by Hatchette for Games Workshop. Here, I’m collecting an list of the contents, rules and links to the individual items. ForbiddenPlanet sells the things, lets you pic-and-mix, ships internationally, ships sooner and can be cheaper than the producer … when you purchase at least 11 issues at once.1 symbol meaning - i have the issue / i have painted or otherwise digested the issue into my collection ; i’ve started it Delivered Issue 01 / Chainrasp Horde and (Dreadfane) Sequitors (and dice) Everyone panic bought this issue.

item.title: WikiPete7 - Skelecron
Special Miniatures
item.description: This is an (incomplete) listing of the “special” models Games Workshop has released and sold in funky ways. I started compiling it when sopmeone pointed out that I had “missed”1 several Nighthaunt models by only2 painting what was currently for sale.

item.title: YouTube and Special Miniatures
item.description: I made a YouTube video and started a Special Models list.
